publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5347 Joe FitzPatrick: Student Fundingâ€”That the Parliament notes with caution the work of Universities UK and its report, Changing Landscapes: future scenarios for variable tuition fees, in particular its model that tuition fees in England should be increased further; notes that this has been met with concern by some student groups, and reiterates a commitment to free education in Scotland. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
